document_data.name: ''Rod of Beguiling''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rods of beguiling''''' were [[enchanted]] [[rod]]s that could calm and charm even the angriest creatures.
document_data.Description: ''Rods of beguiling'' were beautifully crafted [[oak]]en devices sometimes decorated with a couple of [[gem]]stones.
document_data.Powers: These rods allowed the wielder to cast ''[[charm person]]'' and ''[[dominate person]]'' spells. An average ''rod of beguiling'' held fifty charges and each use of the ''charm person'' spell exhausted one charge, while ''dominate person'' - two.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Angel Rockford]], a [[Ravenian]] [[thief]] and [[wizard]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/43/The Living City: Angel|24}}
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], these rods could be found throughout the [[Sword Coast]] region, notably in the cities of [[Neverwinter]] and sold by an [[imp]] [[Boonmoppet]] in [[Daggerford]]'s [[Western Farmlands]].
